Name: Erroneous
About the game: Fight in the Warzone as Beans with Guns to Capture that Fortified L with your Friends or... with however amount of Bots you like! Fight for your side as you Kill those pesky enemy Beans in this fantasy world and the Universe of Erroneous. With its massive selection of rifles and guns, worlds and gamemodes, there is always something new to feel when starting a game. Will you and your friends master the battles of Erroneous? Erroneous Includes: Singleplayer PvE! Multiplayer PvE and PvP with Friends! Several Gamemodes such as Team Deathmatch, Free-for-All, King of the Hill, Infection, and Sandbox! Huge Selection of Weapons and Grenades! Sandbox Mode, where you have the freedom to do anything! and More!
